name: Core â€“ Design File Template
description:
Use this template to organise your design project. Some of the main features are:

  • Project Status
  • Design Checklist
  • Project overview
  • Page strucrure examples
  • Problem framing prompts
  • Handoff, Research and local components best practices.

I started to create this file structure at previous job and still improve it. Some of my friends use the whole file as it is, others use only the file structure deleting everything else.


Duplicate it and share how it helps you at your design process. Feel free to mention me on Twitter @lonewolfkaz.
